text_logic_form: Find the length of line SP.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the length of line SP.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line SM is $3x + 5$ units.
The length of the line SP is $6x - 7$ units.
Point S lies on the line connecting points J and B.
Point P lies on the line connecting points J and T.
Point M lies on the line connecting points J and C.
The line SM is perpendicular to the line JM.
The line SP is perpendicular to the line TP.
The measure of angle MJS is equal to the measure of angle PJS.
line_instances: There are lines CP, JB, JC, JM, JP, JS, JT, MC, SB, SM, SP, and TP in the diagram.
